Gertrude K. McNish

  1. Foster Name: Gertrude
  2. Foster Family: Abram A. and Marie Johnson
  3. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 10
  7. Date of Birth: 1897-09-22, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1980-12-24, San Diego, CA
  9. Gender: female
  10. Spouse Name: Howard James Johnson
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; OTR 405; OTR 40; Find-A-Grave for Harold McNish Dravo; Find-A-Grave for Gertrude K. McNish Johnson; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1900 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex.
